member.name: P:Hangfire.Azure.ServiceBusQueue.ServiceBusQueueOptions.QueuePrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets the prefix that will be prepended to all queue names in the service bus (e.g. if the prefix is "a-prefix-" then the default queue will be named "a-prefix-default" in Azure)

member.name: P:Hangfire.Azure.ServiceBusQueue.ServiceBusQueueOptions.Configure
member.summary: Configures a queue on construction, for example setting maximum message size of default TTL.
